briefTitle: A Study of Subcutaneous C.E.R.A. for the Maintenance of Hemoglobin Levels in Participants With Chronic Renal Anemia Not on Dialysis.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Chronic renal anemia
* Stable darbepoetin alfa or epoetin beta therapy for past 8 weeks

Exclusion Criteria:

* Transfusion of red blood cells during previous 8 weeks
* Poorly controlled hypertension requiring interruption of epoetin treatment in previous 6 months
* Acute or chronic bleeding requiring therapy within previous 8 weeks

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Maintaining Hb Concentration Within +/-1 Gram Per Deciliter (g/dL) of Their Reference Hb and Between 10.5 to 12.5 g/dL Throughout the Efficacy Evaluation Period (EEP)
outcomeMeasures.description: The reference Hb value was taken as the time adjusted average of all Hb assessments during the Stability Verification Period (SVP) (Week -4 to Week 0). EEP was from Week 16 to Week 24.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Hb Concentration Between SVP and the EEP
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change in the time-adjusted average Hb concentration between the two study periods SVP (Baseline) and EEP is presented. The SVP was defined as Week -4 to Week 0. The EEP was defined as Week 16 to Week 24.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Maintaining Hb Concentration Within Hb Range 10.5 to 12.5 g/dL During the EEP
outcomeMeasures.description: The EEP was defined as Week 16 to Week 24.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Time Spent in Hb Range of 10.5 to 12.5 g/dL During the EEP
outcomeMeasures.description: The EEP was defined as Week 16 to Week 24.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Blood Transfusion
Percentage of Participants With Dose Adjustment
outcomeMeasures.description: A dose adjustment was defined as a change versus the preceding dose. It included dose increase and dose reduction from the dose given at Baseline.
